name: Core & Crust
description:
You are a baby alien that hatched in the core of a planet. To join your fellow aliens on the surface, you must make a dangerous journey through the planet's layers.

CONTROLS:
Z to jump
WASD or arrow keys to move
Enter to select a menu option
Z + Down arrow/S to dash
Jump while against a wall to wall-jump

I was heavily inspired by Hollow Knight for this game! There's also an Easter egg that references a different piece of media, and if you get the reference you get an imaginary internet point.
